message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire this valuable item. As we start the negotiation, I'd like to make an initial offer of $9500. This is a competitive price, and I believe it's a great starting point for us to work together.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I would like to propose a lower price of $7500. I hope this aligns better with my budget.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $7500. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll offer you a price of $9000. This is a fair compromise, considering the product's value to you.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget, I would like to propose a price of $8500 for the product. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle for us.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price of $8500. I'm willing to make another concession. I'll offer you a price of $9200. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, considering the product's value to me.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I've reviewed the situation again and am willing to increase my proposed price to $8800. I hope this aligns better with your valuation of the product.

I understand you're getting close to your maximum budget, Bob. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price of $8800. I'll make one more concession. I'll offer you a price of $9100. This is the final price I'm willing to consider.
Thank you for your final offer, Alice. I've carefully considered our negotiations and am willing to agree on a price of $8900 for the product. I hope this is acceptable.

I'm surprised you're still willing to negotiate, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go any lower than my previous offer. I'll make one more concession. I'll offer you a price of $9050. This is the absolute lowest I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. Considering our negotiations, I'm willing to agree on a price of $8950 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise.
